PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , the fused rings can make the polymer backbone more rigid and coplanar , therefore enhancing effective π-conjugation , lowering bandgap , and extending absorption.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| effective π-conjugation |
| bandgap |
| absorption |
| rigidity of polymer backbone |
| coplanarity of polymer backbone |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| effective π-conjugation |
| bandgap |
| rigidity of polymer backbone |
| coplanarity of polymer backbone |

Note: The words "making the polymer backbone more rigid and coplanar" imply that rigidity and coplanarity are properties of the polymer backbone. Therefore, they are valid entities. The words "therefore enhancing effective π-conjugation, lowering bandgap, and extending absorption" describe the effects of the mentioned properties, not the properties themselves.
